code: import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{Card}from"antd";import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{setProductDetail}from"../actions/productActions";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function ProductItem(_ref){var product=_ref.product;var dispatch=useDispatch();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{className:"bg-gray product",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/products/".concat(product.category,"/").concat(product.id),onClick:function onClick(){console.log('click on product item image');dispatch(setProductDetail(product.id,1));},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{style:{width:'100%'},src:product.image,alt:product.name})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h6",{className:"product-category",children:product.category}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"product-name",children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"product-description",children:product.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-more",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/products/".concat(product.category,"/").concat(product.id),className:"product-link",onClick:function onClick(){console.log("click on product item more text");dispatch(setProductDetail(product.id,1));},children:"See More ..."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"text-gray",children:["USD ",product.price,".00"]})]})]})]});}
